query:
SELECT 
  id,
  customerId,
  CONCAT('[', customerEmail, ']') as customerEmail_bracketed,
  LENGTH(customerEmail) as email_length,
  HEX(customerEmail) as email_hex
FROM jobs 
WHERE customerEmail LIKE '%12%customer%'
LIMIT 1;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PejtppQzUdF9US.e7bec8248b17 --database 2cukUCNz2S5THQpLSDbdYn --execute SELECT

  customerId,
  CONCAT('[', customerEmail, ']') as customerEmail_bracketed,
  LENGTH(customerEmail) as email_length,
  HEX(customerEmail) as email_hex

WHERE customerEmail LIKE '%12%customer%'
LIMIT 1;
